story.headline: A Home With Many Lives
story.intro: Every wall at Casa Schuck holds a chapter. From its origins as a colonial estate to its rebirth as San Miguel's most intimate boutique hotel, this home has sheltered artists, visionaries, and seekers for over 150 years.

eras.title: The Beginning
eras.body: Built in 1871, the house at Garita 3 began its life as a colonial residence in the heart of San Miguel de Allende. Thick cantera stone walls, vaulted ceilings, and a central courtyard — built for the generations who would inhabit it.

eras.title: The Schuck Era
eras.body: A century later, the Schuck family brought new energy to the property. Under their stewardship, the home became a gathering place for writers, painters, and intellectuals drawn to San Miguel's growing creative scene.

eras.title: An Artist Colony Blooms
eras.body: Through the 1970s, San Miguel de Allende transformed into an international artist colony. Casa Schuck was at its center — hosting exhibits, salon evenings, and the kind of conversations that only happen when creative souls share a courtyard.

eras.title: San Miguel's First Luxury B&B
eras.body: In 1978, Casa Schuck became one of the first luxury bed & breakfasts in San Miguel de Allende — pioneering a new kind of hospitality that was equal parts home, gallery, and sanctuary.

eras.title: A Living Heritage
eras.body: Today, Casa Schuck continues to evolve while honoring every chapter that came before. Nine rooms, each with its own personality. Original art on the walls. A courtyard that still gathers the creative, the curious, and those who simply need a place to exhale.

story.pullQuote: We didn't build a hotel. We opened our home.

weddings.description: Imagine your ceremony in a centuries-old courtyard, beneath the jacaranda, with the sound of a colonial fountain as your music. Your reception on the rooftop, under a sky full of stars, with the Parroquia lit up in the distance.

services.headline: Curated Moments, Crafted For You
services.description: From the restorative to the adventurous — our concierge team designs experiences that transform your stay into a personal journey through San Miguel.
services.massageDescription: Unwind without leaving the sanctuary. Professional massage therapists come to you — in your room or in the courtyard, your choice.
services.massagePricing: 60 min: $80 USD | 90 min: $110 USD | 120 min: $140 USD
services.massageNote: Arranged through concierge. 24-hour advance booking recommended.
services.honorBarDescription: Help yourself to craft mezcal, local wines, and artisan spirits on the honor system. A curated selection that celebrates the best of Mexico's distilling traditions.
services.wineRackDescription: A rotating selection of Mexican wines hand-picked by our team. Ask us for pairing recommendations.
services.toursDescription: Discover San Miguel's hidden ateliers, rooftop mezcal bars, and centuries-old churches with our local expert guides. Walking, culinary, and art-focused itineraries available.
services.dayTripsDescription: Hot springs at La Gruta, the ancient ruins of Canada de la Virgen, wine country in Dolores Hidalgo — unforgettable journeys just beyond the city gates.
services.diningDescription: Secured tables at San Miguel's most coveted dining rooms. From rooftop fine dining to intimate mezcalerias — we handle the details.

retreatsPage.headline: The Anchor of Your Inner Circle.
retreatsPage.introBody: Casa Schuck is uniquely engineered for high-impact gatherings. While our nine luxury suites offer an exclusive sanctuary for your core team, our deep local roots allow us to seamlessly anchor groups of up to 60. We provide the infrastructure, the "Access To" logistics, and the central colonial stage for your collective experience. Whether a wedding party or a creative summit, you have the space to convene and the privacy to connect.

pillars.title: YOGA
pillars.body: Rise with San Miguel. Practice in the open air with 360-degree views of the Parroquia. From sunrise vinyasa to starlit meditation, our rooftop becomes your private studio where the city meets the sky.
pillars.alt: Yoga practice on the rooftop terrace above San Miguel de Allende

pillars.title: WELLNESS
pillars.body: Modern healing behind 300-year-old walls. Engage in sacred ceremonies and sound baths led by the region's most respected practitioners. Behind thick cantera walls and the rhythm of the courtyard fountain, stillness is the ultimate luxury.
pillars.alt: Sacred ceremony space within colonial cantera walls

pillars.title: RETREATS
pillars.body: Nine rooms. Zero noise. Absolute connection. Casa Schuck is the premier destination for Women's Journeys, Men's Circles, and Creative Intensives. Our architecture is specifically designed for the movement between collective focus and personal reflection. Behind these colonial walls, you aren't just a guest; you are the host of your own world. Whether it is a writing retreat, a leadership summit, or a spiritual reset, a full-house buyout transforms the estate into your private laboratory for growth.
pillars.alt: Private retreat space at Casa Schuck for group intensives
